name: Space Battle Meteor
storyline:
In the Xion Galaxy, where mysterious and dangerous cosmic phenomena have become commonplace, there exists the intergalactic corporation "StarTech," dedicated to space exploration and security. You, as the captain of the starship "Aurora," become a key figure in the struggle against threats from the depths of space.

Scientific research in the "StarTech" laboratory has led to the discovery of a new energy source, coveted by hostile extraterrestrial civilizations. They have initiated attacks, sending meteorites and enemy shuttles to seize this technological marvel.

Your mission is to deliver the precious cargo to the "Nova Prime" base, facing numerous dangers along the way. In pursuit of you, enemies are not willing to let you rest. They track you through black holes and asteroid belts, aiming to stop you by any means.
summary:
"Space Battle Meteor" is an exciting game filled with cosmic adventures and intense combat. In this thrilling arcade, you take on the role of a space pilot whose mission is to protect the shuttle from meteorites and enemy spacecraft.

You'll need to maneuver among the stars and destroy approaching meteorites using the full arsenal of your space weapons. Beware of enemy shuttles that will attempt to disrupt your mission and interfere with delivering your shuttle to a safe location.

However, your spacecraft is not left defenseless. Upgrade your ship, improve weapons, and defense systems to become even more powerful and effective in combating threats from space. With each level passed, your experience and skills will grow, unlocking new possibilities for your cosmic adventure.
